column2: July 22]], [[1969]]) is an American voice actor, widely recognized as the voice of Obi Wan-Kenobi in various ''Star Wars'' games and series, Johnny Test in the eponymous show, and Wooldoor Sockbat in ''Drawn Together''. Taylor provided several voices for [[Vivendi]] video games.
